title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 458 - Conduct Of Snowmobile Special Events
content:

State Regulations
§ 458.1 - Preliminary preparations
§ 458.2 - During special event
§ 458.3 - After special event

General Instructions for Design and Placement of Snowmobile Signs (§ 458.10 to 458.17)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 458

Statutory authority: PRHPL, §25.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
